name: Interactive House demo
description:
This is a demo of a service I am working on making (I need to fix some issues).

House model by  Tristan  https://grabcad.com/library/modern-australian-house

Tile texture from cc0 textures https://cc0textures.com/view?id=TilesSubstance009

There is no built in tutorial (yet ) so you need to read this: 

  • The controls for moving around and looking are the standard FPS controls. 
  • To change the time of use the scroll wheel (pressing shift speeds this up)
  • To change the colour of an object right click on it
  • To move non static objects left click and hold
